name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: RFK is known for his controversial health ideas, like drinking raw milk and adding roadkill to the food pyramid. But the conspiracy theory that he’s most known for is that vaccines cause autism. He’s basically a health expert the same way that Katy Perry is a rocket scientist.

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: Wait, that’s the big tragedy for you? ‘These poor kids will never know the joy of attaching a Schedule K to a 1040A.'

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: That’s not even accurate. I mean, autistic people do pay taxes. Are you thinking of art history majors?

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: What do you mean they don’t date? Does the Kennedy compound not have Netflix ? Okay, because David took Abby on a f*cking safari to Africa. And, okay, could Connor be a little more open about dating blondes, sure. But couldn’t we all.

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: Everything this guy said is ridiculous. Autistic kids will never write poems? Well who wants kids to write more poems? That’s something we should be preventing.

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: I mean why even pretend you’re going to study it? We all know you’re going to blame vaccines. This whole thing is more rigged than a golf championship at Mar-a-Lago.

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: You know when commercials say 9 out of 10 doctors agree? This is the 10th doctor.

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: I mean, this guy looks like the reason second opinions were invented.

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: But enough about RFK, let’s move onto Elon Musk. Living proof that autistic people can do anything, including destroy the government.

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: This is why you should switch the settings on your DMs to ‘followers who don’t want to impregnate me only.'

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: I mean, you haven’t met this person, you’re already trying to raw-DOGE her?

name: Ronny Chieng
monologue: That’s where you draw the line? Like, ‘Yeah, I don’t want one of those woke social justice books, I’m looking for more of a beach read. Do you have Mein Kampf ?'

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: See? We don’t need any more funding, we’ve already got a new anti-drug campaign for young people: Just say no—unless you want to see dinosaurs!

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: So look out for exciting new products like Tyson’s Tangy Buffalo Beaks N’ Thumbs.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: HHS is also actively trying to make health officials dumber. They’ve halted efforts to collect data on everything from cancer rates in firefighters to outbreaks of drug-resistant gonorrhea. Which means soon the only source of data will be TLC’s new reality show, Drug-Resistant Gonorrhea Island .

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: This Sunday, he is risen and you is high.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Sooo, it’s space farts. You know what they say, he who smelt it detected the possible signature of alien life on a distant planet.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Having to dye potatoes because of the high price of eggs is the reason our grandparents left the old country.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: And for such an anti-DEI sort of guy, you’d think he wouldn’t have the same taste as Liberace, but he does.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Do you think that Donald Trump knows that King Midas is a cautionary tale?

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The planet they’re calling K2-18B, they’re naming it after one of Elon Musk’s kids.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: They’ve done repeated analysis of the atmosphere and they suggest that an abundance of a molecule that on Earth has only one known source that is living organisms, also known as ‘sea scum’ is there. So we may have found a new home for Ted Cruz.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It’s only 120 light years away, so off you go, Elon and Jeff. Time to climb into those space dildos and boldly go away.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The way things are going, the U.S. has a better chance of being visited by aliens than Canadians.
